displayTitle.description: Browser action title when preventing screen-off.

systemTitle.description: Browser action title when preventing system sleep.

untilText.description: Suffix to append to above Titles to append an end time

autoDisableAfterText.description: Text labelling a slider allowing setting a timeout for disabling the power saving state.

autoDisableAtText.description: Prefix Text indicating the time when the state will automatically switch to disabled.

autoDisableHoursSuffix.description: Text to append after a number indicating a quantity of hours

disabledLabel.description: Button label to indicated keep awake is disabled.

displayLabel.description: Button label to indicated keep awake is preventing screen-off.

systemLabel.description: Button label to indicated keep awake is preventing system sleep.

usePopupMenuTitle.description: Checkbox item indicating that the popup menu should always be shown.

openStateWindowMenuTitle.description: Menu item opening a popup window to change the state.
